title: Absolute Duo
alternative_title: アブソリュート・デュオ
description: After losing a loved one, Tooru Kokonoe enrolls at Kouryou Academy so as to gain a "Blaze," a weapon that is his soul manifestation, for the sake of revenge. He was expecting a weapon... What he got was a shield... How is he to seek revenge with something that isn't even a weapon?!
genre: [<Genre -> Action>, <Genre -> Ecchi>, <Genre -> Harem>, <Genre -> Romance>, <Genre -> School>, <Genre -> Supernatural>]
